devdoc.author: Stanisaw Gogowski <stan@pillarproject.io>
devdoc.details: the `DepositExit` process can be used in a case operator (guardian) couldn't sign commit / withdrawal message. Process will be rejected when any of senders channels will be committed.

DepositAccountDeployed(address,address).details: Emitted when the deposit account is deployed

DepositExitCompleted(address,address,add.details: Emitted when the deposit exist is completed

DepositExitRejected(address,address,addr.details: Emitted when the deposit exist is rejected

DepositExitRequested(address,address,add.details: Emitted when the deposit exist is requested

DepositWithdrawn(address,address,address.details: Emitted when the deposit has been withdrawn

PaymentChannelCommitted(bytes32,address,.details: Emitted when the payment channel has been committed

PaymentDeposited(bytes32,uint256).details: Emitted when the payment has been deposited

PaymentSplit(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when the payment has been withdrawn and deposited (split)

PaymentWithdrawn(bytes32,uint256).details: Emitted when the payment has been withdrawn

returns._0: true when deposit account is deployed

devdoc.title: Payment registry

commitPaymentChannelAndDeposit(address,a.notice: Commits payment channel and deposit payment

commitPaymentChannelAndSplit(address,add.notice: Commits payment channel, withdraws and deposits (split) payment

commitPaymentChannelAndWithdraw(address,.notice: Commits payment channel and withdraw payment

getDepositExitLockedUntil(address,addres.notice: Gets deposit exit locked until time

isDepositAccountDeployed(address).notice: Checks if deposit account is deployed

userdoc.notice: A registry for payment and payment channels
